title: SLMC, ACMC extend support to Sajith
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Four Parliamentarians of the Sri Lanka Muslim Congress and the All Ceylon Muslim Congress who previously supported the Government in the 20th Amendment met the Leader of the Opposition today (14).
They have emphasized that they will extend their support to Sajith Premadasa in the future.
Nearly 90 arrested in connection with 9th May events: Police
